<<<<<<< HEAD
Some errors of the Quakers detected viz. their denial of Christ, his sacrifice, ordinances, the Resurrection of the Body, and Christ's second coming : to which is added proof tha the light in all men is not Christ : with an answer to a Quaker's praise of William Penn / by Francis Estwick ... Estwick, Francis.
32 p.
Printed for the author and are to be sold at several places in London, [London] : 1697.
"The preface to the reader" signed : Francis Estwick. Imperfect : pages faded, stained and tightly bound with some loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
=======
